alert.note: Alert for Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 24 at 9:50PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM MDT FOR WESTERN CUSTER...FALL RIVER...SOUTHWESTERN PENNINGTON AND SOUTHEASTERN WESTON COUNTIES... At 950 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Elk Mountain Lookout to 7 miles southwest of Argyle to 4 miles west of Ardmore, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rumford, Ardmore, Argyle, Cottonwood Springs Dam, Bear Mountain Lookout, Wind Cave National Park, Medicine Mountain, Hot Springs, Cold Brook Reservoir, Custer, Crazy Horse Memorial, Maverick Junction, Hill City, Sylvan Lake, Custer State Park, Black Elk Peak, Palmer Gulch Resort, Stockade Lake, Mount Coolidge, Blue Bell and Legion Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
